price: (36) Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
